item.title: Getting startet with LiDAR
item.description: LiDAR data and LAS data format Technically spoken the LiDAR data comes in the LAS file format (for a format definition i.e.Â have a look at the American Society for Photogrammetry & Remote Sensing LAS documentation file). One LAS data set typically but not necessarily covers an area of 1 km by 1 km. Since the point clouds in the LAS data sets are large, a spatial index file (LAX) considerably reduces search and select operations in the data.
